directions: Cook linguine according to package directions in 4 quart sauce pan. Drain; remove from pan. Keep warm.

Melt butter in same pan until sizzling; add chicken. Cook over medium-high heat, stirring often, until chicken is golden brown (6-8 minutes). Stir in lemon juice, salt and red pepper. Return cooked linguine to pan; toss to coat. Stir in green onions.
Serve with a salad and french bread.
ingredients: 8 ounces dried linguine; broken in half, Uncooked
title: Peppered Lemon Chicken Pasta
